name: W - (double you)
description: W Corporation has bribed the Wizardo cult to join their empire. With the power of magic and taxes on their side, they have become unstoppable. Young Querby refuses to live in a world run by magic and money laundering. Armed with the best shotguns five dollars can buy, he battles his way through the hordes of wizards to reach the top of W Tower and topple the government.
